Name: Aqua Simple Tunic
Description: A plain aqua tunic, fit for a serf or peasant in a time of knights and nobles.

Name: Aqua Enchanted Tunic
Description: A splendid aqua tunic, enchanted with a charm to boost your evade skills on the battlefield!

Name: Aqua Ornate Tunic
Description: A finely-crafted aqua tunic, adorned with exquisite embroidery fit for a noble warrior.

Name: Aqua Sturdy Tunic
Description: An aqua tunic built to last, made of high-quality fabric ideal for any yeoman.

Name: Aqua Regal Tunic
Description: A truly magnificent tunic, dyed in a rich aqua hue, worthy of a powerful lord or a high-ranking cleric.

Name: Aqua Reinforced Armored Tunic
Description: This sturdy aqua armored tunic is reinforced, offering a layer of extra protection to any brave soul.

Name: Aqua Dragonhide Armored Tunic
Description: Crafted using rare aqua dragonhide, a wearer of this armored tunic gains a significant increase in defense capabilities.

Name: Aqua Adorned Armored Tunic
Description: An magnificently adorned armored tunic, complete with aqua emblematic accents, fit for a distinguished knight.

Name: Aqua Mystical Robe
Description: A mystical robe in aqua hue, exuding an air of enraptured whispers from an arcane world.

Name: Aqua Valor Armor
Description: A glorious set of aqua armor, reflecting the courageous heart of its master on the battlefield.

Name: Aqua Luminous Robe
Description: A finely woven luminous robe, shimmering with the brilliance of the aqua essence harbored within.

Name: Aqua Belted Coat
Description: A well-tailored aqua coat adorned with elegant belts, fit for a noble with a penchant for adventure.

Name: Aqua Guardian Armor
Description: A regal set of aqua armor, offering unmatched protection to those stalwart defenders of realms unknown.

Name: Aqua Battleplate Armor
Description: A resilient aqua battleplate, imbued with the strength to crush foes and leave them quaking in fear.

Name: Aqua Arcanist Armor
Description: An elegant set of aqua armor, crafted to enhance the mystical prowess of a skilled arcanist.

Name: Cerulean Aqua Warlock Robe
Description: A mystifying aqua robe, woven with ancient enchantments to channel insurmountable magical power.

Name: Burnt Ember Aqua Sorcerer Robe
Description: An alluring aqua robe, designed to ward off the most potent spells and protect the master of sorcery.
